fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Premonition: You know what cards you'll draw next. *You may reroll them once.*

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Convoke: Choose a non-special card that all Chaos members will draw this phase. Replaces one card in Chaos membersâ€™ regular draw. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Revival: Choose a player. If they die from non-event causes in this phase, they will live on 1 HP instead, with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3, Locks D5] 
- Fake: Choose a card a player will draw this phase. It will appear normal, but when played the target will gain 1 Bleeding, 1 Burning, and 1 Poisoned instantly. [Infinite uses, 2 CD, Astral]
